text: @derekquinn by the way I've head that point free released update that use similar perceptual image comparison method, https://t.co/QN1dwjl9ix Have not yet tried myself new release, but my friend said they we not yet as successful in terms of matching actual view. Give it a try and let me kno

replyTo.text: @derekquinn yes, you can combine multiple views to have an art board of little things that do not change often for example. advantage - see all things at once and how they match, disadvantage one thing change and you commit giant file into repo. But since you use git LFS, it's not a problem.
